Class ScrabbleModel

java.lang.Object
ScrabbleModel
public class ScrabbleModel extends Object
Model class for the Scrabble game with MVC pattern. It contains the logic and game state. It notifies the views when the model changes with Observer pattern.

    • initializeGame

      public boolean initializeGame(int numPlayers, String[] playerNames)
      Starts a new game with the given number of players
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - the number of players between 2 and 4
      playerNames - array of player names
      Returns:
      true if initialization works, false if otherwise

    • placeWord

      public int placeWord(int row, int col, int direction, String word)
      Tries to place a word on the board
      Parameters:
      row - row from 0 to 14
      col - colum from 0 to 14
      direction - 1 from horizontal which is the right and 2 for vertical which is 2
      word - the word to place
      Returns:
      the score if valid is >0 or 0 if not

    • scoreCalculation

      private int scoreCalculation(int row, int col, int direction, String word, List<Tile> usedTiles)
      Calculate the score for a placement of word
      Parameters:
      row - the row
      col - the column
      direction - 1 for right and 2 for down
      word - the word that is being placed
      usedTiles - tiles used from the hand
      Returns:
      score if valid and 0 if invalid

    • swapTiles

      public boolean swapTiles(String swappingTiles)
      It swaps the tiles from current player's hand.
      Parameters:
      swappingTiles - string og tile characters to swap
      Returns:
      true if swap worked and false if otherwise.
